meaning_str.bing:
adj. 性行为的；性的；生殖的；有性繁殖的
网络. 性别的；性感；两性的

性行为的；性的；生殖的；有性繁殖的

性的；性欲的；性别的；性行为的；生殖的；有性繁殖的

sogou-kaoyan.adj: 性的; 性欲的[出现1次)];性别的; 性特征的[出现0次)];有性繁殖的[出现0次)]

sogou-CET6.adj: 性的; 性欲的[出现0次)];性别的; 性特征的[出现0次)];有性繁殖的[出现0次)]

sogou-CET4.adj: 性的; 性欲的[出现0次)];与两性有关的[出现0次)];性别的; 性特征的[出现0次)];有性繁殖的[出现0次)]

1.en: If any sexual behaviour is out of tune with the natural world, it is surely that of the priesthood.
1.cn: 如果有任何和这个自然界唱反调的性行为，那无疑就是这种天主教的僧侣生活。

2.en: But said after they are in a sexual relationship, it brings with it the promise of commitment and a potential father to any child.
2.cn: 不过，假如男人在他们发生性关系后再表白，这意味着承诺，并可能成为孩子的父亲。

3.en: On her mistress's death, Jacobs was sold to a white master who tried to force her to have sexual relations.
3.cn: 女主人去世后，她被卖给一个白人奴隶主。奴隶主试图强迫与她发生性关系，她奋力进行了抵抗。

0.en: Women are required to dress in a way that does not attract sexual attention.
0.cn: "女性的穿着不能对他人具有性吸引力"。

1.cn: 自尊低落。社交焦虑。性生活不安全感。

2.en: Well, granted, Penny, your secondary sexual characteristics are reasonably bodacious.
2.cn: 佩妮，虽然你的第二性征相当明显。

3.en: And this was a sexual case, too? Yes, prostitution. Lockhart/Gardner just seems to obsess on these sexual cases.
3.cn: 这也是个性犯罪案件吗？是的，卖淫案。洛&加律所似乎对性犯罪案件很着迷。

4.en: Sure. Sure, I'll just sit next to the trans-sexual from purchasing.
4.cn: 是啊，是啊，我会坐在采购部那个变性人旁边。

5.en: We expected them to be conservative in the sexual preferences and they were.
5.cn: 我们也预测他们的性偏好会较为保守，事实与预测一致。

6.en: Yeah, nothing happen. You could cut the sexual tension in here with a knife.
6.cn: 是啊，没跟他亲热，刚才的情欲张力一触即发。

7.en: We still have you in your office conducting sexual relations with underlings.
7.cn: 我们还有你在办公室和下属有过性行为的牌没打呢。

8.en: Now it also says here that you lied about your sexual preference before marriage?
8.cn: 这上面还说你在婚前隐瞒性向。

9.en: You mean sexual intercourse? Well, when you say it like that you make it sound creepy.
9.cn: 你是指性爱？你这么一说，就显得怪怪的。

10.en: You can imagine studying in many situations. We chose sexual arousal, so what did we do?
10.cn: 我们可以研究不同情况的双重人格，我们选择性兴奋状态作变量，我们的研究是怎样进行的呢？

11.en: Now given that winter is coming, one can only assume she's signaling sexual availability.
11.cn: 既然冬天都已经到了，只能说明她是在暗示，她可以作为做爱对象。

12.en: They keep throwing sexual harassment cases at me and I keep knocking them out of the park!
12.cn: 他们一直把性骚扰案丢给我，我一直把他们打得毫无退路。

13.en: Last night, I was feeling in need of sexual release when I happened to come across your mother.
13.cn: 昨晚我有释放性需求的感觉时，恰好想到你的母亲。

14.en: Their sexual pics and the prostitution scandals are all as a disgrace to the country and its people.
14.cn: 更有甚者，被曝光丑闻，让人民简直不忍直视。

15.en: And we ask them questions. We ask them questions about the sexual preferences, the whole list of things.
15.cn: 我们问他们一些问题，一些与性爱偏好有关的问题，一整页与之有关的问题。

16.en: And over the last year, I've dedicated myself to sexual assault reform, and have made meaningful strides.
16.cn: 而去年一年，我都致力于性侵法案改革，已经取得可喜进展。

17.en: There are pitfalls. Trust me, I know. When it comes to sexual harassment law, I'm a bit of a self taught expert.
17.cn: 这有隐患，相信我，我清楚，说到性骚扰的相关法律，我可是自学而成的专家。

18.en: What? You wanna see me self-defend myself? Go over there and pretend you're a sexual predator. Go on. I dare you.
18.cn: 你想试试我的防身术吗？现在就假装你是性侵犯者，有种就去。

19.en: Anyway, should you have any interaction with her, it would be most helpful that she not see you as a sexual rival.
19.cn: 而且你应该多和她接触一下，好让她别感觉到你是她的性竞争对手。
